      • getBySize

        public static AdType getBySize(int width,
                               int height)
        Returns the display AdType according of the size.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the display banner, in dip.
        height - The height of the display banner, in dip.
        Returns:
        AdType requested, or null if the size requested is not compatible.

      • getByValue

      • getFunctionalAdType

        @Deprecated
public AdType getFunctionalAdType(android.content.Context context)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the functional AdType.
        Parameters:
        context - The Context.
        Returns:
        If the AdType is different of SMART_BANNER, this method will return the same AdType. Otherwise, the returned AdType will depend of the device status.
